body:
During the rule of Zine El-Abbidine Ben Ali in Tunisia, there was a lack of communication between the government and the people. While members of the government did not bother themselves in informing the public with transparency, Tunisians did not either bother them because they have had enough of the lies and propaganda games of the regime. In other words, the element of trust was gone and Tunisians have found social media as an alternative, not only to have access to information, but also report on major events. The interim government however has chosen to take a different strategy in communicating with the public. 
The trend, started on the 10th of febraury,when the ministry of interior established its own facebook fan page 
The page witnessed a tremendous success, more than 110 thousand fans in one week.
(@toubib4u) tweets

 The Tunisian Minister of Interior page on Facebook, very smart step to communicate with Youth
